name: 粘朝益
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 數位影像基礎，2. 空間域影像強化，3. 頻域影像強化，4. 影像還原，5 彩色影像處理，6 形態學影像處理，7. 影像分割，8. 影像壓縮，9. 機器視覺系統。
1. Fundamental digital image, 2. Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 3. Image enhancement in the frequency domain, 4. Image restoration, 5. Color image processing, 6. Morphological image processing, 7. Image segmentation, 8. Image compression. 9. Machine vision system.
schedule:
Week 1 : Introduction to Python
Week 2 : Introduction to OpenCV
Week 3 : Fundamental digital image
Week 4 : Geometric transform
Week 5 : Image enhancement in the spatial domain
Week 6 : Image enhancement in the frequency domain
Week 7 : Image Restoration
Week 8 : Color image processing
Week 9 :  Midterm exam
Week 10 : Image segmentation
Week 11 : Binary image processing
Week 12 : Wavelet Transform
Week 13 : Image compression
Week 14 : Feature extraction
Week 15 : Image special effect
Week 16 : Deep learning
Week 17 : Machine vision system
Week 18 : Final exam
scorePolicy:
1. midterm exam 30%
2. Final exam 30%
3. Home work 40%
materials:
1. 數位影像處理：Python 程式實作，作者：張元翔，出版社：全華圖書
2. OpenCV 影像創意邁向 AI 視覺王者歸來，作者：洪錦魁，出版社：深智數位
